description:
With Fujitora`s stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die ultimative Kraft – Das Geheimnis der Operations-Frucht!
Kyuukyoku no Chikara: Op-Op no Mi no Himitsu!
Le pouvoir ultime. Le véritable secret du Ope Ope no Mi !
The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!
究極の力 オペオペの実の秘密!
